citation.case_name: United States, Ex Relatione Societe De Condensation Et D'ApplicAtions Mechaniques v. Conway P. Coe, Commissioner of Patents.

html_with_citations:
302 U.S. 721

58 S.Ct. 42

82 L.Ed. 557

UNITED STATES, ex relatione SOCIETE DE CONDENSATION ET D'APPLICATIONS MECHANIQUES, petitioner,
v.
Conway P. COE, Commissioner of Patents.*

No. 298.

Supreme Court of the United States

October 11, 1937

Messrs. Reeve Lewis and Philip Mauro, both of Washington, D. C., for petitioner.

1

For opinion below, see 91 F.(2d) 238.

2

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia denied.

*

Rehearing denied 302 U.S. 776, 58 S.Ct. 136, 82 L.Ed. ——. Second petition for rehearing denied 304 U.S. 589, 58 S.Ct. 1043, 82 L.Ed. ——.
